credit_line: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 249 x 56 cm (8 ft. 2 1/16 in. x 22 1/16 in.)
title: Window blind sample
medium:
Medium: synthetic fiber, Lurex, wood
Technique: plain weave
description: Sample of a woven window blind with warp stripes and rigid wefts. The warps are of grey, orange, and green synthetic yarns and gold-colored Lurex strips; the wefts are 1/2 inch diameter, half-round wooden dowels alternating with 1/8 inch diameter reeds in various sequences.
name: Window blind sample
